body_html: We don't currently have a way to handle this. In theory it should be possible to write a Graph Transform Tool rule to do the swizzling, or maybe in Grappler, but we'd need to maintain a list of all the ops this applies to. We don't have any plans to work on this in the near term unfortunately, but PRs would be welcome.

body: We don't currently have a way to handle this. In theory it should be possible to write a Graph Transform Tool rule to do the swizzling, or maybe in Grappler, but we'd need to maintain a list of all the ops this applies to. We don't have any plans to work on this in the near term unfortunately, but PRs would be welcome.
